title: Stoned in Charm City
description: "No Good Deed Goes Undamned"Forty dollars. Two crisp twenties. All that stands between Assumpta Mary Margaret O’Connor and homelessness.For the price of forty dollars, she helps archeologist Greg LaSpina find something he’s lost–and causes all Hell to break loose.Literally.With demons tormenting their every step, Assumpta and Greg become both hunted and hunter in their search for a way to send the demons back to Hell. One careless mistake could cost them their lives.Wrestling with her faith, Assumpta considers an offer made by one very sexy demon: sleep with him, and learn how to rid the world of the escaped evil.But the offer comes with a steep price: her immortal soul.
author: Kelly A. Harmon
